snippet: In an event organized by the League of United Latin American Citizens, about two dozen protesters demanded that NBC rescind an invitation that Mr. Trump had accepted to host the show this week.
abstract: In an event organized by the League of United Latin American Citizens, about two dozen protesters demanded that NBC rescind an invitation that Mr. Trump had accepted to host the show this week.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Scheduled Appearance on ‘Saturday Night Live’ Draws Protest
